attributes.action: allow free prescriptions for elderly badgers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many years, the plight of the badger has been overlooked.  In old age, many badgers find it difficult pay for proper healthcare, simply because they are not given access to free prescriptions.
Many people are not aware of the unfairness of this situation - for example, squirrels get free prescriptions from 3 years old.
Please sign my petition.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
